name: photorealistic-portrait
positive: professional portrait photo, natural lighting, shallow depth of field, bokeh background, detailed skin texture, natural skin tones, perfect eyes, sharp focus on face, canon 85mm f/1.4, studio lighting, professional photography, 8k uhd, dslr
negative: cartoon, anime, painting, drawing, illustration, blurry, low quality, bad anatomy, deformed, disfigured, ugly, oversaturated, overexposed, underexposed, grain, noise
notes: Best with Realistic Vision or similar photorealistic models
